The fetish of the girl probably stems from when previous abuse (probably from home) e.g mom or dad hurts their child first before providing something, this subconsciously translates to "I need to get hurt first to be satisfied.

We can see this in some of Bifidus' work like Harada's way home, Mika Hiding from the Rain, and the Hot Spring Sex with the Yukata Girl.

Let me explain, the girl has this "fetish" of wanting to get punched in the stomach (probably due to abuse from before) but her BF doesn't want to punch her in the stomach when they're having sex (that explains her acting strangely to her BF) that's why she tried to piss off those delinquents crossing the hallway so that she can get punched in her stomach but when they tried to have their way with the girl (for which she didn't want) they just beat her up instead and when the BF went to look for her she now got what she wanted of having her stomach punched plus having her BF have sex with her.
In conclusion she wasn't trying to be a slut in wanting to have another men's dicks shoved to her pussy (the cheating part is wanting to fulfill her need of getting punched in the stomach which her - BF doesn't want to do, and not from wanting another man's dick in her pussy since she clearly gave off a fight when they tried to have sex with her.

It's pretty simple, guys. You have to read it in the original collection called: Kimi o Sasou Uziki Ana. This is one of several stories. The background story is she was molested and raped by the gym teacher. He would often punch her in the stomach. Over time, she gotten used to it. The blonde guy was her ex-boyfriend who stopped the teacher and saved her. They got into a relationship, but they broke up. Since he stop having sex with her, she went with the next best thing: our MC. I think she found her happiness with him.
